```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
df <- readRDS('flats.rds')
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(Area)) +
  stat_bin(color = "white", fill = "#006D77", bins = 40) +
  labs(title = "Distribution area of flats (m2)") + 
  theme_bw() 
  
```
```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(Price)) +
  stat_density(aes(fill = Condition)) +
  labs(title = "Distribution area of flats (m2)") + 
  theme_bw() 
  
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x= Area, y = Price, color = Condition)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Distribution area of flats (m2)") + 
  theme_bw() 
  
```

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x= District, y = mean(Price))) +
  geom_col( fill = "#006D77") +
  labs(title = "Distribution area of flats (m2)") + 
  theme_bw() 
  
```
